title: Practical Case Analysis for Sustainability and Strategic Management

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational sustainability concepts and strategic management frameworks
context.additional_context: Implementation of Accessible Case-Based Learning in Mobile Environments for Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze industry sustainability reports to derive at least three improvement items at the strategy implementation phase (Single-loop learning).
Learners can explain the impact of sustainability reporting on the strategy formulation phase (Double-loop learning) through two or more practical scenarios based on case studies.
Learners can propose strategic adjustments using real-world corporate sustainability data through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
